2016.meganium.bundle.2: Grab Green Power with the Meganium Bundle!
2016.meganium.bundle.3: Meganium’s Leaf Trans Poké-Power lets you move {G} Energy among your Pokémon however you like! Add the Solarbeam attack for 80 damage, plus three 10-card booster packs from HS—Undaunted, and your deck is ready to blossom!
2016.meganium.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 3 Pokémon TCG: HS—Undaunted booster packs (10-card) 1 foil Meganium Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, HGSS08) These cards are legal for Legacy format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through October 3, 2017. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
2016.pyroar.bundle.2: Great Mane of Fire! Pyroar Bundle Now Available
2016.pyroar.bundle.3: The Intimidating Mane Ability prevents all damage done to Pyroar by your opponent’s Basic Pokémon—and that includes Basic Pokémon-EX! This bundle comes with Pyroar and Litleo, 4 booster packs, and a set of card sleeves. Let them hear you roar!
2016.pyroar.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 4 Pokémon TCG: XY—BREAKthrough booster packs (10-card) 1 Pyroar Pokémon card (XY—Flashfire, 20/106) 1 Litleo Pokémon card (XY—Flashfire, 19/106) Card sleeves inspired by Pyroar These cards are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through September 26, 2017. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.achievemen: Knock Out 20 Pokémon with your {N} Pokémon.
Knock Out 20 Pokémon with your {Y} Pokémon.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.
(You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
If your opponent's Pokémon used an attack that isn't a GX attack during their last turn, use it as this attack.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

product.custom.bundle.pyroarcollection.s: The Intimidating Mane Ability prevents all damage done to Pyroar by your opponent’s Basic Pokémon—and that includes Basic Pokémon-EX! This bundle comes with Pyroar and Litleo, 4 booster packs, and a set of card sleeves. Let them hear you roar! This bundle contains: 4 Pokémon TCG: XY—BREAKthrough booster packs (10-card) 1 Pyroar Pokémon card (XY—Flashfire, 20/106) 1 Litleo Pokémon card (XY—Flashfire, 19/106) Card sleeves inspired by Pyroar

Cards from XY—BREAKthrough are legal for Standard format tournaments and competition. Pyroar and Litleo are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition. Offer Expires: 9/27/2017 This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
